text_logic_form: The length of side $a$ is $8$ units.
The length of side $b$ is $15$ units.
The length of side $c$ is $17$ units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of side $a$ is $8$ units.
The length of side $b$ is $15$ units.
The length of side $c$ is $17$ units.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is equal to the length of side $c$.
The length of the line $CB$ is equal to the length of side $a$.
The length of the line $CA$ is equal to the length of side $b$.
The line $CB$ is perpendicular to the line $CA$.
line_instances: There are lines $CA$, $CB$, and $AB$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
